# dot-file-icon

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Represent a mapping of legacy icons if DotCMS

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| `icon`   | `icon`    |             | `string` | `''`    |
| `size`   | `size`    |             | `string` | `''`    |
